docstr: `BGT` â€” Bitwise greater than ### Description Determines whether an integral is a bitwise greater than another. ### Syntax `RESULT = BGT(I, J)` ### Arguments type. | `J` | Shall be of `INTEGER` type, and of the same kind as `I`. ### Return value The return value is of type `LOGICAL` and of the default kind. ### Standard Fortran 2008 and later ### Class Elemental function ### See also BGE, BLE, BLT
